entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is introduced as a character who is standing near the Triwizard Cup. He is described as looking at Harry and then staring at the cup with a longing expression.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is injured and leaning against a hedge. He tries to get up but his leg is shaking badly.

relationships.description: Cedric looked at Harry, who was holding onto the hedge for support.
Harry encouraged Cedric to take the Triwizard Cup, saying 'Take it, then.'
Cedric stared at the Triwizard Cup with a longing expression.
Harry was holding onto the hedge to support himself, implying that he had previously held or touched the Triwizard Cup.
